com.threerings.media.tile

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.threerings.media.tile.Tile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseTile, ObjectTile, TrimmedTile

    public class Tile
extends Object
    A tile represents a single square in a single layer in a scene.
